0. The day before the lecture, 0.5hr

1. Never heard about MPI before..

2. a) # which mpicc
      # /usr/local/intel/impi/5.0.3.048/intel64/bin/mpicc 
	  
      # qsub ping-2chip.pbs
      # qsub ping-2core.pbs

		ping-2chip

		1 7.93074e-07
		1001 1.30246e-06
		2001 1.59002e-06
		3001 2.0908e-06
		4001 2.43616e-06
		5001 2.80516e-06
		6001 3.16272e-06
		7001 3.54048e-06
		8001 3.9108e-06
		9001 4.26456e-06
		10001 4.61026e-06
		11001 4.97592e-06
		12001 5.36322e-06
		13001 5.70742e-06
		14001 6.04863e-06
		15001 6.42238e-06
		16001 6.81818e-06

		ping-2core

		1 3.07879e-07
		1001 4.20555e-07
		2001 4.96035e-07
		3001 5.6833e-07
		4001 6.34105e-07
		5001 7.25451e-07
		6001 8.14559e-07
		7001 9.13451e-07
		8001 9.9282e-07

		13001 1.52977e-06
		14001 1.64264e-06
		15001 1.7413e-06
		16001 1.83159e-06


   b) # module load openmpi/1.10.0-icc-15.0.3
      # which mpicc
      # /usr/local/intel/impi/5.0.3.048/intel64/bin/mpicc 
	  
      # qsub ping-2chip.pbs
      # qsub ping-2core.pbs

		ping-2chip

		1 7.96834e-07
		1001 1.31142e-06
		2001 1.61507e-06
		3001 2.09136e-06
		4001 2.42968e-06
		5001 2.79516e-06
		6001 3.11054e-06
		7001 3.45662e-06
		8001 3.84275e-06
		9001 4.16455e-06
		10001 4.50762e-06
		11001 4.82683e-06
		12001 5.20321e-06
		13001 5.55423e-06
		14001 5.87076e-06
		15001 6.24066e-06
		16001 6.63988e-06

		ping-2core

		1 3.01485e-07
		1001 4.04155e-07
		2001 4.73266e-07
		3001 5.48135e-07
		4001 6.2185e-07
		5001 7.30995e-07
		6001 8.07716e-07
		7001 9.07485e-07
		8001 1.00337e-06
		9001 1.10284e-06
		10001 1.22117e-06
		11001 1.3264e-06
		12001 1.4206e-06
		13001 1.51275e-06
		14001 1.6251e-06
		15001 1.73126e-06
		16001 1.83943e-06


   c) flop_rate = 16 * 2.4e9 * 12 = 4.6e11
      flop_rete * 1.76e-05 = 8.16e
	  flop_rete * 2.8e-7 = 129024
	  flop_rate * 2.8e-7 / 12 = 10752
